name: AudioCardChimp
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio card chimp
Developer Terms of Use
des: To send an audio card just go to audiocardchimp.com. The recipient receives an email with the code, opens up the skill on Alexa and can then play the card.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
